item.title: February 2025 Webinar ARCHIVE

item.content:encoded:

[/dfd_heading][dfd_heading subtitle="" enable_delimiter="" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h5|font_size:30|color:%23f70062" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]
THIS IS AN ARCHIVED PRESENTATION FROM THE ABOVE DATE
[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color="blue"][vc_column_text]

PROGRAM INFORMATION

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1528420010170{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}" col_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" col_shadow_hover="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)"][vc_separator color="blue"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h3|color:%2333d187" subtitle_font_options="tag:h4"]TOPIC 1[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_new_team_member team_member_name="Robert C. Doll, CFA" team_member_job_position="Chief Executive Officer and Chief Investment Officer, Crossmark Global Investments" team_member_description="" icon_size="15" team_member_photo="17303" title_font_options="tag:div|font_size:24|line_height:40|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:div|font_size:16|color:%2334d288|line_height:24|font_style_bold:1"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

ARCHIVE MATERIALS

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_button button_text="Webinar Recording" main_style="style-2" tooltip_text="Click to Open in New Tab" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Fcommunity.aaii.com%2FHigherLogic%2FSystem%2FDownloadDocumentFile.ashx%3FDocumentFileKey%3D698bcff1-9791-8780-0a8c-6dfa055a3f3d%26forceDialog%3D0||target:%20_blank|" undefined="" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" title_font_options="font_size:20" tutorials=""][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Bob Doll is a financial services industry veteran with over 40 years of experience managing large cap equity strategies as well as long and long-short equity strategies. His weekly, quarterly, and annual investment commentaries focus on key themes and risks driving equity markets, monetary policy, and the global economy. Bob is a regular guest and contibutor to multiple media outlets such as CNBC, Bloomberg TV, Moneywise, and Fox Business News.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]10 Predictions for 2025[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Investors can expect the bull market to continue, but remain cautious about valuation.  Policy uncertainty is higher than usual, in part because there are so many policy changes at the same time.  Donald Trump campaigned on a mix of policies that are both economy supportive (tax cuts and deregulation) and disruptive or negative (tariffs and deportation).  As a result, the election outcome has created fatter tails for the U.S. economy.  It is possible that a mix of pro-growth and disruption policies will occur simultaneously, thereby heightening uncertainty as well as economic and financial market volatility. [/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]
Attend this talk and learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20did%20Bob%20Doll%20do%20in%20his%20predictions%20for%202024%3F%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22What%20are%20Bob's%20predictions%20for%202025%3F%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Which%20sectors%20of%20the%20market%20will%20outperform%20and%20which%20sectors%20should%20investors%20stay%20clear%20of%3F%22%7D%5D" subtitle_font_options="tag:h4"]TOPIC 2[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_new_team_member team_member_name="Amy P. Raskin" team_member_job_position="Chief Investment Officer, Chevy Chase Trust" team_member_description="" icon_size="15" team_member_photo="17302" title_font_options="tag:div|font_size:24|line_height:40|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:div|font_size:16|color:%2334d288|line_height:24|font_style_bold:1"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

ARCHIVE MATERIALS

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_button button_text="Webinar Recording" main_style="style-2" tooltip_text="Click to Open in New Tab" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Fcommunity.aaii.com%2FHigherLogic%2FSystem%2FDownloadDocumentFile.ashx%3FDocumentFileKey%3D7da4c27d-8cdb-ca61-235b-9a87373875c5%26forceDialog%3D0||target:%20_blank|" undefined="" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" title_font_options="font_size:20" tutorials=""][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]As Chief Investment Officer, Amy P. Raskin leads investment strategy, research and portfolio management at Chevy Chase Trust.  Prior to Chevy Chase Trust, Amy was Senior Vice President at AllianceBernstein in New York, serving as Director of Thematic Research, head of U.S. & Global Growth Equity Research and Chief Investment Officer of AllianceBernstein Venture Capital Fund. Amy’s team published in-depth research papers on a wide range of investment-related topics such as climate change, China, molecular medicine, hybrid autos and broadband, among others. Amy joined AllianceBernstein in 2000 as an equity analyst and spent 13 years there focused on deep research and thematic investing. Earlier, she worked as an investment banker at Lehman Brothers and as a research analyst at Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette. Amy graduated from the University of Pennsylvania School of Engineering and Applied Science with a major in Systems Engineering and a minor in Management from the Wharton School. She serves on the Board of Advisors for the University of Pennsylvania School of Engineering and Applied Science and is a member of the Board of Directors of the JDRF T1D Fund, a venture philanthropy fund focused on finding a cure for type-1 diabetes. Amy is a guest contributor on CNBC and a sought-after speaker at industry conferences.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]Thematic Investing:  Capitalizing on Change[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]In this presentation, Amy Raskin will discuss her firm's long-standing approach to Thematic Investing.  She will address some of the most consequential secular changes she believes are influencing the markets today and explain why she believes a major transition in market leadership is about to begin.  Finally, Ms. Raskin will review her current investment themes and answer questions about her positioning and methodology.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]
Attend this talk and learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20to%20identify%20powerful%20disruptive%20trends%20taking%20place%20in%20the%20economy%20today%20and%20how%20an%20investor%20can%20benefit%20from%20these%20disruptions%20for%20a%20sustainable%20period%20of%20time%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22What%20are%20some%20of%20the%20most%20important%20changes%20taking%20place%20in%20the%20economy%20today%2C%20and%20which%20sectors%20will%20benefit%20the%20most%20and%20which%20sectors%20do%20investors%20need%20to%20avoid%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Why%20the%20massive%20shift%20toward%20indexing%20and%20passive%20investing%20has%20accentuated%20overvaluation%20of%20some%20sectors%20and%20massive%20undervaluation%20of%20other%20sectors%20and%20why%20this%20will%20contribute%20to%20a%20major%20transition%20in%20market%20leadership%22%7D%5D" item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
